name: Rainforest Rachel(Prototype)
description:
Work in progress, would love to have feedback and suggestions. I plan on adding more abilities as well as more hazards, weapons, etc. This is "playground" mode at the moment to get an idea, I've only spent 8 hours on this game so far.

Keyboard Controls are-

Escape- Pause Menu

A, D or Left/Right arrow keys to move

Space- Jump

Left Shift - Run
Right Shift - Sash

Gamepad(I use Xbox 360)-

A - Jump

B- Dash

X - Run

Left Joystick-Move
